name: Pleasure villa
description:
During a difficult period of his life, young Tommy has finally found the perfect job! He was hired as a handyman in the rich and luxurious Pleasure Villa! Everything seems to go in the right way now: a very good salary, a good place to live, and the Pleasures, a nice family to work for! But every member of this family and even its crew seems to hide a different secret! Why does detective Rhonda Robinson want to frame Mr Aristotele Pleasure? Will Tommy resist the incredible sex appeal of the two young Pleasure daughters, Elettra and Marika? What secret is Mrs Venere Pleasure hiding, and how could Tommy use it for his purposes? Sweet waitress Cindy is so gorgeous, but how could Tommy help solve her difficult situation? And how could he evade Ambrogio's and Amanda's (the evil and mysterious Pleasure's crew) attacks? Just one thing is sure for now: In Pleasure Villa every room hides a secret, and they're HOT!
In this visual novel the player has the control of the protagonist and will be able to move in a very large environment in search of intrigues to solve.
The most important moments will be reported in a replay gallery.
